resources.string: Once complete, click confirm & we will test access, if the command fails, please try again.
No Permissions, please allow shortcutter to override DND

Some shortcuts require the ability to modify notification & DND settings, as we cannot request this permission in the normal fasion, you will need to enable it. 

Click proceed & you will be taken to the relevant screen.

Some services require the ability to write system settings, as we cannot request this permission in the normal fashion, you will need to enable them. 

Click proceed & you will be taken to the relevant screen.
Press back to return to the app.
You are about to disable all ROOT features, this will remove any QS tiles that require ROOT access. \n\nDo you want to proceed?
Your device appears to be rooted. \n Toggle me for more QS Tiles!
Show your support & enable all app features.
Click Here To Unlock Shortcutter Premium!
Enables access to \"Advanced Access Tiles\" - (A PC is required to grant this permission)

You can manually grant Shortcutter access to Secure Settings, allowing more control over the system. 

From your PC go to 'www.leedroid.co.uk/\#SettingsSecureGuide' & follow the instructions.
Your device does not support subscriptions.
Error launching purchase flow. Another async operation in progress.
Multiple licenses detected! \nThanks for your support!
In App Billing is not supported on your device yet. \n\nWould you like to purchase a Premium key via the play store?

Purchasing a Shortcutter unlock key will permanently unlock all app features.

And the best news is, it costs less than a cup of coffee!
Both of the below options will unlock all premium features, select one & enjoy the full power of Shortcutter!
Show next alarm, click opens alarms
Toggle through brightness steps \n(Define steps in Tile Settings)
Hide the status & navigation bars\n(Manufacturer/OS support dependent)
Toggle location mode Off/GPS/Battery Saving/High Accuracy
Displays available & total RAM, with a shortcut to go to RAM information
A tile to record everything on your devices screen
Takes a still image of your device screen
A tile to display the volume panel
Launch the hidden SystemUI Tuner \nFunctionality is Manufacturer dependent
Settings Secure access required. Go to \"Manage Permissions\" in the home tab.
Keep screen on when plugged in
Send a new SMS with 1 click
You dont appear to have granted Shortcutter the correct permissions, have you launched the app?
Generates a random number \n(Change range in Tile Settings)

Designed & Developed By: 

• Lee Bailey (AKA @LeeDrOiD)

 Translations By: 

• @4ntagonist - German 
• @Linar10 - Polish 
• @Nuno Nebeker - Portuguese 
• @Evren GüntürKün & Fatih Fırıncı - Turkish 
• @guillerag & @E M Seguin - Spanish 
• @Majida Whale - Chinese 
• @Kodenma - Japanese 
• @Anonymous ;) - Russian 
• @SamiA - Persian 

If you are interested in helping me translate the app, drop me an email using the Email Feedback option in the menu.

Additional Graphics By @Bogdan
Select a custom number range for the Dice Tile
This application must run once prior to using any tiles or services \n\nPlease pay attention to the dialogs

Shortcutter needs permission to access Data Usage history. 

Please click proceed, select Shortcutter & enable usage access.
Reset on the %1$d day of each month
Select the day of the month to measure data from (Usually your billing date)
Shows Mobile Data Usage \n(Change cycle in Tile Settings)
Failed to launch data usage information
Click Here for A guide to adding Quick Setting Tiles.
How To Add QS Tiles - Guide

This feature is only available in the Premium version of Shortcutter. 

Please click GO PREMIUM now to enable the following features: 

 • Additional Custom Tiles 
 • Screen Recording & Capture 
 • Quick Reminder 
 • Clipboard Editor 
 • App Launcher 
 • Additional in-app configuration options 
 & Remove the 60 tile click notification

Thats 60 Shortcutter clicks! 

Have you considered showing your support & going Premium? 

This notification will show every 60 tile clicks in the Free version.
Write System Settings permission required - Toggle to enable
Usage Access permissions required - Toggle to enable
Do Not Distrurb access required - Toggle to enable
Required to use the \"Lock Screen\" Quick Settings Tile
Toggle Split Screen / Multi Window Mode

Shortcutter requires Admin privileges to:

 •Lock your device screen 

Please press proceed & enable Admin rights to use this Shortcut.
Please select a time in hh:mm:ss
Routes all audio through your device earpiece

Several Shortcutter services require the "Draw System Overlay" permission to run, these include:
 
• Sidebar/Floating Toolbox. 
• Screen Filter/Night Mode. 
• Rounded Corners. 
• Network Mode Dialogs. 
• Volume Panel. 
• Screen Record Controls. 
• Floating Calculator. 

Please click proceed & grant the required permission.
A Sidebar opened by a swipe of the trigger, or a Floating ToolBox with a floating icon.
Change Number Of Tiles In Collapsed View
Customise the number of QS tiles shown in the collapsed Pull-Down. \nThis MOD is manufacturer dependent.
Choose between the Swipe Out Sidebar or Floating Toolbox.
Are you sure you want to reset all colour preferences?
A screen filter to reduce eye strain at night (Night Mode)
Uses an overlay to give the illusion of rounded screen corners
Shortcutter offers a number of different options to access an array of shortcuts, settings & services in an instant.

The Quick Settings Pull-Down 
 
• A whole array of additional Quick Settings Tiles. 
• Access apps, shortcuts, toggles, tools & services from your system pull-down panel.

The Sidebar/Floating Toolbox 
 
• Always on top & accessible. 
• Choose between a SideBar or a Floating Toolbox. 
• Open with a swipe or a touch of the trigger. 
• Fully customisable colour, layout, position & design. 
• Access apps, shortcuts, toggles, tools & services!

Exposed Icons/Launcher Shortcuts 
 
• Add an array of Exposed Icons (little apps) to your app drawer & home screen. 
• Make your shortcuts accessible to other apps like Tasker, Nova Launcher & Edge Sense!

Dynamic State Shortcuts 
 
• An abundance of dynamic state home screen shortcuts! 

To add a launcher shortcut:
 Long press your home screen, go to shortcuts and select Shortcutter Shortcuts.
Produces a screenshot using the system screencap binary
Enable/Disable the fancy reflow Pull-Down animation (Not compatible with all devices)
Launches a popup with current weather information
Displays current location, with options to view in maps or share

This overlay requires Accessibility access to: 

 • Detect secure activities. 

If a secure activity is detected, this overlay will be suspended. 

Please click proceed & enable the service.
Launches Settings \> Location/n(if no settings secure access)
Provides an always on Nightlight & clock display, plus a button to switch to Desk Clock Mode
Create an additional \"Sidebar Expander\" icon to open/close the Sidebar from your home screen or other apps.
Usage: Brightness, Font Scale, Haptic Feedback & Display Timeout
Usage: Floating Sidebar/ToolBox, Screen Filter & Rounded Corners
Usage: Recent Apps, Power Menu, Split Screen, Expand Notifications & Quick Settings, Screen Filter & Rounded Corners

This toggle requires the ability to check network state.

 In order to do this the app needs the Phone permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This service requires the ability to access external storage.

 In order to do this the app needs the Read/Write Storage permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This toggle requires the ability to access the camera (Flash).

 In order to do this the app needs the Camera permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This toggle requires the ability to access your Sync settings.

 In order to do this the app needs the Read/Write Sync permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.

This toggle requires the ability to access your Location.

 In order to do this the app needs the Location permission.

 Please click proceed & grant the permission when prompted.
Don\'t forget to leave review in the Play Store!\n\nAny additional issues or feedback, please drop me an email :)
Create additional icons to access toggles from your home screen or app drawer.
Dim background & collapse when touched outside or button pressed.
Quick Settings tiles to toggle system settings.
Tiles that provide & link to useful system information.
Services, \"Micro Apps\" & features provided by Shortcutter.
Assign Applications, Activities, Shortcuts & Web Links.
Assign Applications, Activities, Shortcuts, Web Links & Shell Commands.
Change the behaviour & default actions performed by these toggles.
These permissions will be requested when enabling services that require them.
Run the app in the English Language

Your device requires applications to be granted auto start permissions, Shortcutter background services will be killed if this is not enabled.\n\nPlease click Proceed & enable auto start for Shortcutter.

Shortcutter contains several background services. 

None of these services are power hungry or intensive, however Android may still kill them when the device goes into deep sleep. 

To negate this issue, please consider disabling Battery Optimisation for the app via Settings > Search > Optimisation. 

Or click "Action Now" to go straight there.
Failed to add window, please open the app and make sure Screen Overlay permissions have been granted
Change the display to black and white (Monochrome)
Launches Settings \> Power\n(if no settings secure access)
Usage: Screen Lock\nOnce this permission is enabled, you will need to disable it to uninstall the app.
Sidebar opens when trigger is touched or swiped\n(up, down or inward)
Sidebar opens when swiped\n(up, down or inward)
Sends a POWER key event using shell
Something went wrong, please try again. If this issue persists, please contact me with your device details.
Something went wrong, have you granted Contacts & Phone permissions?

As you are using a Samsung device, you may experience tiles becoming unresponsive after being dormant.\nTo rectify this issue, please exclude Shortcutter from battery optimisations in your device settings.
Shrinks your display to the bottom right corner, not all apps scale correctly
Are you sure you want to clear your Screen Filter schedules?
Disable, change assignment or rename tile?
Allow Unknown Sources / Installation of non market apps
Launches the Screen Cast device list
Force refresh Shortcutter Quick Settings Tiles\n(To be used if tiles become unresponsive)
Launch Picture In Picture on current app
Reboot,Reboot Recovery,Reboot Download,Reboot Bootloader,Hot Reboot,Reboot Safe Mode
Oops.. looks like something went wrong & Shortcutter Crashed!\n\n\Sorry for the inconvenience.
Your device appears to be rooted!\n\n\Would you like to enable all root features now?

Change Log: 

v7.7.2: 
• Start of app interface overhaul. 
• Improve layout in Sidebar Designer. 

v7.7.1: 
• Crash fixes. 
• Theme corrections. 
• Dark theme as default. 
• Improved initial trigger position logic. 
• Fix default trigger tint. 
• Improve preferences refresh logic. 

v7.6.7: 
• Fix Behaviour & Settings with Floating Toolbox Enabled. 
• Fix & improve floating trigger sensitivity. 
• Code optimisations. 

v7.6.6: 
• Make SideBar Trigger position lockable. 
• Fix RAM tile click - average memory usage. 
• Fix delay in re-launching apps from custom tiles. 
• Fix Direct Dial. 
• Fix Direct Message. 
• Update sidebar trigger image. 

v7.6.4: 
• Move Volume Panel to standalone app. 
• Fix floating calculator toggle. 
• Support library updates. 
• Bug fixes. 

v7.6.2: 
• Fix accessibility crash. 
• Fix Vol Panel firing in lock screen. 
• Fix disable accessibility in Manage Perms. 
• Fix vol panel not always responding to key events. 

v7.5.9: 
• Show BT icon in vol panel if connected. 
• Make volume intercept free. 
• Make vol panel custom colours premium. 
• Add option to hide alarm in vol panel. 
• Add option to start volume Panel collapsed. 
• Improve colour accuracy of sidebar items. 
• Fully customisable Volume Panel colours. 
• Layout adjustments. 
• Fix refreshing custom tiles on assignment change. 
• Performance improvements. 
• Fix standalone key validity with other licences. 
• Fix minimise button in sidebar header. 
• Correct vol panel timeout text. 
• Fix disabling floating recorder controls. 

v7.5.2: 
• Make sidebar header transparent. 
• Translation Updates. 

v7.5.1: 
• Fix items still checked when removed from sidebar. 
• Add Persian translations - Thanks @Sami A 
• Translation Corrections. 
• Layout Corrections. 

v7.4.9: 
• Fix choosing screenshot storage path. 
• Fix Floatibg Toolbox trigger obscuring views. 
• Fix crash when launching app from shortcuts. 
• Sidebar fill screen vertically if nav hidden & vertical fill enabled. 
• Home UI Adjustments. 
• Fix Mute Media setting volume to max. 
• Translation updates. 

v7.4.2: 
• Get weather data in system language. 
• More detailed weather description. 
• Add Mph/Kph units for wind speed. 
• Add option to change Volume Panel timeout. 
• Fix German string format in my location. 
• Fix drag & drop sidebar trigger. 
• Add floating controls to screen recorder. 
• Check standalone premium key is from google play. 
• New Sidebar Expander icon. 
• Fix option to hide Nav Bar with Sidebar. 
• Fix crash when no system file browser installed. 
• Move Sidebar expander & Quick Tile to main fragment. 
• Adjust default sidebar trigger scale. 
• Translation Updates. 

v7.3.7: 
• Fix crash in billing activity. 
• Suspend weather service if location unavailable. 
• Update translations. 
• Remove header round corners with sidebar. 
• Apply swipe listener to sidebar header. 
• Tweak sidebar header layout. 
• Add option to hide Nav Bar with Sidebar open. 
• Smooth Sidebar back view transition. 
• Sidebar tab layout adjustments. 
• Restart app following data restore. 
• Settings tab layout adjustments. 
• Fix crash in shortcuts. 
• Translation updates. 

v7.3.4: 
• Fix Screen Record & Capture crash with invalid storage path. 
• Update default save paths for Backup & Screen Capture 
• Round corners on as default. 
• Update header view when restarting sidebar. 
• Remove header round corners with sidebar. 

v7.3.2: 
• Fix swipe trigger. 
• Improve long press to drag trigger position. 
• Fix crash in screen record & capture. 
• Show widget items that require sys setting perms if not granted. 

v7.3.1: 
• Enable long press & drag sidebar trigger to change vertical position. 
• Make trigger scaling free - non premium. 
• Fix crash in accessibility service. 
• Widget adjustments. 
• Add widget text color option. 
• Add internet permission for new weather implementation. 
• New Weather Service thanks to OpenWeather Map. 
• Enable weather in Widgets. 
• New Location library - Thanks David Serrano. 
• Open weather Map Helper Library - Thanks Kwaben Berko. 
• Add option to remove rounded Sidebar corners. 
• Apply sidebar theme changes on the fly. 
• Remove Google Awareness APIs (Depreciated) 
• Make Mobile Data toggle available non root (Link to Settings) 
• Vol Panel - Adjust BT Volume with Media & Call. 

v7.2.6: 
• Disable Accessibility Key Listener if Vol Panel Override is off. 
 - Fixes Gestures and issues with apps like Netflix. 
• Fix crash in app drawer. 
• New Shortcut to Tethering & Hotspot Settings. 
• Reduce APK Size. 

v7.2.5: 
• Reduce Vol Panel timeout to 3 seconds 
• Fix vol Panel Override in android 7 
• Do not send close dialogs broadcast in vol panel 
• Widget scaling improvements. 
• Properly handle crash in services, no error thrown. 
• Countdown Timer - notify until cleared. 

v7.2.2: 
• Fix QS Custom Tile 8 
• Fix sidebar trigger positioning 

v7.2.1: 
• Layout adjustments. 
• Temporarily disable free weather service 
- Google have stopped the awareness API, I am looking at new options. 
• Fix text being cut in nav list 
• Add elevation to dialogs 
• Update accessibility description 
• Fix item scaling in widgets 
• Add Edit Widget options to launcher section 
• Add search box to widget editor 
• Widget items now added in order 
• Fix Vol Panel timeout using Handler 
• Add Call Volume to Volume Panel 
• Fix bug in Cast max volume 
• Set DND/Silent on vol- from vibrate 
• Introduce app blacklisting for Vol Panel 
• Set vol to 75% when headset plugged/unplugged 
• Bug Fixes 

v7.1.3: 
• Fix SystemUI Tuner Tile. 
• Fix Settings Secure hyperlink. 
• Begin mapping long press actions to pull-down tiles. 
• Add Cast Volume to Volume Panel (when active). 
• Improve Volume Panel enter/exit transition. 
• Stop Volume Panel closing dialogs. 
• Only show shortcut status toast when state has changed. 
• Translation Updates. 
• Bug Fixes. 

v7.1.1: 
• Fix crash in My Location. 
• Call onClick in Floating Toolbox trigger. 
• Add option to change Vol Slider colour. 
• Remove APM Intercept & block power on 8.1+. 
- Google removed the hook and there is no alternative. 
• Significant accessibility optimisation. 

v7.1.0 
• Fix Accessibility performance regression. 
• Fix APM check boxs. 
• Bug Fixs & clean-ups. 

v7.0.9: 
• Improve APM intercept and Power Menu blocker on android 7. 
• Translation updates. 
• Make default vol slider stream optional. 
• Fix vol panel notification. 
• Corrections to weather service. 
• Fix address line 2 in My Location. 

v7.0.8: 
• Make Night Light/Desk Clock available as DayDream Screen Saver. 
• Stop system Volume Panel showing when overriding. 
• New security feature: 
- Block power dialog when screen locked (Accessibility & Premium Required). 
• New secure Awareness API keys. 
• Fix disabling SC Provided Vol Panel. 
• Shorten weather tile string. 
• Migrate to Android X Support libraries. 
• Update Google Play Services library. 
• New Notification Listener Service. 
• Block Vol Panel when casting (notification listener required). 
• Show unread notification count in Night Light (notification listener required). 
• Code optimisations. 
• Translation updates. 

v7.0.7: 
• Fix critical error in google awareness API access.. 
• Fix accessibility service consuming key events. 
• Fix disabling volume panel override. 
• Reduce startForeground crashes. 
• Add elevation shadow to Vol Panel. 
• Vol Panel permission checks. 

v7.0.5: 
• Performance enhancements. 
• Fix Vol Panel in Android 7. 
• Fix crash in Vol Panel when no DND Access. 
• Collapse Vol Panel if home or recent apps pressed. 
• Do not fire APM or Vol Panel if locked or screen off. 
• Fix crash in Clipboard & Reminder if no speech recognition app found. 

v7.0.4: 
• Fix volume buttons firing twice in Vol Panel. 
• Add left handed vol panel option. 
• Add vol panel Dark/Light modes. 
• Layout corrections. 
• Do not fire volume panel if in call. 
• Do not restart services if restart in process. 
• Theme corrections. 

v7.0.3: 
• Start app with drawer open for faster selection. 
• Fix open sound settings from Vol Panel. 
• Remember past Ring & Media un-muted levels in volume panel. 
• Add option to intercept system volume dialog (accessibility required). 
• Update all icons based on state. 
• Add 5 second Volume dialog timeout. 
• Fix APM Exposed Launcher Icon. 
• Fix Intercept Power Menu on Android 9+ (accessibility required). 
• Change APM enter/exit transition. 

v7.0.1: 
• Night Light clean-up. 
• Revert in-app purchase flow to billing screen. 
• Interface corrections. 
• Volume UI improvements. 

v7.0.0: 
• Move volume Panel Tile to Shortcutter Section. 
• Use Shortcutter Volume Panel as default. 
• Fix checkboxes in APM menu. 
• Premium detection corrections. 
• Layout adjustments. 
• Fix crash in Night Light. 
• Fix app restart reliability when completing purchases. 

v6.9.9: 
• Change "Home" header to app name. 
• Remove duplicate items from in app menu. 
• Fix reboot confirmation dialog. 
• Add direct reboot option to APM main list. 
• Translation Updates. 
• Do not force English as default. 
• Fix crash in Global Action receiver. 
• Update social icons. 
• Layout adjustments. 

v6.9.8: 
• New custom Nav Drawer list adapter with summaries. 
• Move social media items to Nav Drawer. 
• Re-order items. 
• Translation updates. 

v6.9.7: 
• Fix crash in backup manager. 
• New Navigation Drawer UI. 
• Pop custom tile selector on enable. 
• Do not start services refresh if fired in last minute. 
• Fix UI being slowed down by restart services. 

v6.9.5: 
• Fix crash in stop screen recorder if already released. 
• Billing interface layout corrections. 
• Fix crash in Night Light. 
• UI updates. 

v6.9.3: 
• Fix crash in notification blocker when no listeners enabled. 
• Layout corrections. 
• Do not group Screen Record notification. 
• Adjust parsing of colours in custom QS tiles. 
• More code optimisation. 

v6.9.2: 
• Improve How To Add Tiles guide. 
• Layout corrections. 
• Code optimisations. 
• Allow search in edit App Drawer. 
• Fix App Launcher Trial expiry. 

v6.8.9: 
• Move Add tiles guide to YouTube. 
• Fix crash in Notification blocker. 
• Add YouTube channel to social links. 
• Translation Updates. 
• Update dependencies. 
• Disable SideBar expander with Sidebar. 

v6.8.8: 
• Fix Quick reminder Layout. 
• PopupMenu adjustments. 

v6.8.7: 
• Fix closing floating calculator. 
• Enable header when switching Sidebar to bottom. 
• Fix installing pinned shortcuts from app. 
• Fix context menu in sidebar when scrolling. 
• Dialog & UI Updates. 
• Code optimisations. 

v6.8.6: 
• Fix crashes on Android 8 & 9 with startForegroundService(). 
• Translation updates. 
• Code clean-up. 
• Remove unused resources. 
• Prompt for settings secure access when selecting advanced access tiles. 
• Add Developer Options Tiles. 

v6.8.5: 
• Android 8 & 9 Updates & improvements. 
• Stability Improvements. 
• Bug fixes. 
• Sidebar designer updates. 
• Increase Widget custom tiles to 20 (Premium) 

v6.8.3: 
• Fix crash when WiFi SSID is unavailable. 
• Fix bug in Screen Shot. 
• Use contact photo if available for Direct Dial & Message. 
• Fix Start foreground in Wake Service. 
• Bug fixes in Round Corners & Screen Filter services. 

v6.8.2: 
• Update Get SSID method for WiFi tile. 
• Align Sidebar context menu items with sidebar position. 
• Re-add "App Settings" to sidebar context menu. 
• Fix app Launcher items not in cache. 
• Optimise resources. 

v6.8.1: 
• Improve restart services and optimise for Android 8 & 9. 
• QS Tile guide updates. 
• Click confirmation improvements. 
• Bug Fixes. 

v6.8.0: 
• Fix URL encoding on custom tile web links. 
• Correct SideBar context menu positioning. 
• Save App Launcher items to Shared Prefs. 
• Instant App Launcher loading (Second Launch). 
• Improve per-app immersive selector. 
• UI Updates. 
• Bug fixes 

v6.7.9: 
• Add side Bar BOTTOM Option. 
• Add independent trigger right/left option. 
• 60 click text corrections. 
• Fix link to Settings Secure Guide. 
• APM & Dialog Improvements. 
• Move APM Options to APM. 
• Fix crash in Speed Service Stop. 
• Add option to stop screen record on screen off. 
• Fix crash in colour picker. 

v6.7.8: 
• Fix sidebar not closing on back/click outside - Android 9. 
• Add message when Screen Shot/Record fails due to Storage. 
• Fix screen record loop if storage is invalid. 
• Add Restart SystemUI to APM. 

v6.7.6: 
• Improve default sidebar theme. 
• Remove header from App Launcher. 
• Fix Floating Calc fail to disable. 
• Premium notification after 60 clicks. 
• Add HTC Glove Mode Tile. 
• Update build tools version. 
• Bug Fixes.
Hide the system "Running In Background" notification for all apps.

To block notifications we need to enable a Notification Listener.

This listener will only listen for notifications from the android system, any notification containing "running in the background" will be removed.

 Please click proceed & enable Shortcutters Notification Blocker.
Set one handed mode to the left
Show total data usage or split by Up\/Down
Trigger becomes invisible when the status bar is hidden. i.e when in full screen video
Force audio to speakerphone (BETA - uses call stream quality)
Launch immersive mode in certain applications
Adds a pinned notification reminder to your pull-down
Shows a notification with up/down data speed
Show total data usage since last boot.
Adding too many tiles may cause performance issues
Running without Shortcutter accessibility services, overlays will block secure buttons
Directly opens the Play Store My Apps section
Shortcutter notifications are disabled. Click here to go to settings and re-enable them.
Send your configuration file to Google Drive, Dropbox or a similar cloud storage solution to restore later.
A Calendar popup with add and view options linked to your system calendar.
These services use system overlays, they may interfere with some applications and permissions screens. I have done all i can to auto disable them when secure activities are present.
Shows available internal storage (Excludes system reserved)
Highlight state-less tiles as always active (Highlighted).
This is an experimental setting, if any negative effects are seen, please toggle this switch back to its previous state.
A simple, always on top floating calculator
Limited to 10 launches in the FREE version
Backup all app data to your internal memory.
Switch headset from Stereo to Mono audio
Add a tile to Enable/Disable the Sidebar to your Quick Settings Pull-down
Shortcutter does not appear to have access to the chosen storage location, please select a new one.
Long press & drag, then click any tile to exit edit mode
Pull-Down QS Tiles will long vibrate if device is locked.
Add an icon to the home screen as well as the app drawer.
Shortcutter is being optimised by the system.\nClick here for more information.
"\n\nAlternatively you can purchase this as a more enhanced standalone app from the play store. "
Tiles that require either ROOT or Settings Secure access.
Auto start screen recording when hitting the toggle.
Enable/Disable items in the share menu.
Shortcutter requires the WakeLock permission to keep the screen awake.
Automatically stops screen recording when the screen is switched off.
Position the Sidebar Right, Left or bottom

Purchasing Shortcutter Premium will unlock the following features: 

• All Custom Tiles 
• Screen Recording & Capture 
• Quick Reminder 
• Clipboard Editor 
• App Launcher 
• Additional in-app configuration options 
 & Remove the 60 tile click notification

Services requiring notification access: 

* Volume Panel
- Detect casting active. 
* Notification Blocker (Oreo +) 
- block the "Running In Background" notification. 
* Night Light/Desk Clock (When Active) 
- display active notification count. 

Very little notification information scanned by Shortcutter & no notification content is stored.
Block the system power dialog when device is locked
Please make sure you are on the latest version of the app.
Widget not active on home screen.

Accessibility access allows shortcutter to perform the following actions/tasks: 
• Toggle Split Screen 
• Toggle Recent Apps 
• Show Power Menu 
• Expand Notifications & Quick Settings 
• Detect Activities - Required for Screen Filter & Screen Corners, these services will be stopped when apps are being installed & permissions are being granted. 

 The only packages monitored are: 
• Settings 
• Package Installer
" Click proceed & go to Shortcutter to enable the service. "
A direct link to the Settings Activity
Long press and hold the trigger to change the vertical position.

Due to app memory limitations and potential performance barriers, this service has moved to a much more robust, flexible and reliable standalone plugin. \n \n Volume Panel Free can be downloaded via Google Play using the below buttons, no advertising will show for existing Shortcutter premium users.

Due to app memory limitations and potential performance barriers, this service has moved to a much more robust, flexible and reliable standalone plugin. \n \n Volume Panel can be downloaded via Google Play using the below buttons.
